articles.title: Diddy sentencing recap: Sean Combs sentenced to over 4 years in prison on prostitution-related charges - The Washington Post
articles.description: The judge ordered Combs to pay a fine of $500,000 and imposed five years of supervised release once he completes his sentence. His defense is planning to appeal.

articles.title: ‘Real Time’: Louis C.K. Explains Why He Wants “To Be Part Of” Riyadh Comedy Festival After “Mixed Feelings”: “A Positive Thing” - deadline.com
articles.description: Louis C.K. is the latest comedian to address his decision to perform at Saudi Arabia's inaugural Riyadh Comedy Festival.

articles.title: 'Golden Bachelor' Gerry Turner Announces Surprising Engagement News - TV Insider
articles.description: The Bachelor Nation star went public with his new girlfriend earlier this year.

articles.title: Jim Mitchum, ‘Thunder Road’ and ‘Moonrunners’ Actor, Dies at 84 - Variety
articles.description: Jim Mitchum, the actor and son of Robert Mitchum, who appeared in 'Thunder Road' and 'Moonrunners,' died Sept. 20 in Arizona.

articles.title: 50 Cent Celebrates Taylor Swift’s Shoutout on ‘Popping’ Album ‘Life of a Showgirl’ - Rolling Stone
articles.description: 50 Cent reacts to Taylor Swift name-dropping him on ‘Ruin the Friendship' on 'The Life of a Showgirl.'

articles.title: 6 true crime TV shows to stream after 'Monster: The Ed Gein Story' on Netflix - Yahoo
articles.description: The new true crime TV shows you should watch now after you check out "Monster: The Ed Gein Story."

articles.title: Taylor Swift’s ‘Wood’: The Best Reactions to Her Horny Song About Travis Kelce’s D**k - hollywoodreporter.com
articles.description: Here are some of the best reactions to Swift praising Kelce's "magic Redwood tree" on 'The Life of a Showgirl.'

articles.title: Does Tilly Norwood Need a Publicist? The AI Actress ‘Is Not Available to Speak’ Yet, but ‘Everyone Wants an Interview’ - Variety
articles.description: A publicist for the company that created Tilly Norwood turned down Variety's request for an interview with the AI creation saying she "is not available to speak to at present.”

articles.title: Taylor Swift Has a Weird Understanding of ‘Being Canceled’ - Vulture
articles.description: Is her song ‘CANCELLED!’ about Blake Lively? Brittany Mahomes? Matty Healy? Swift says she likes her friends canceled, but history says otherwise.

articles.title: Get Ready for Bad Bunny’s Explosive Super Bowl Trump Protest - The Bulwark
articles.description: “He will have the room to be as political as he wants to be.”

articles.title: Taylor Swift is done pretending she doesn’t absolutely love this life - vox.com
articles.description: Conservatives are telling Taylor Swift to be a tradwife. In her new album, she refuses.
